title: Local roundup : Shawsheen Tech rolls to Vocational title
body_text:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...
The Shawsheen Tech girls volleyball team keeps rolling. On Monday, the Rams captured their first ever State Vocational Tournament title with a 3-0 sweep over Norfolk Aggie by scores of 25-8, 25-19 and 25-16. The win brings the team’s record to 22-0 before the state tournament begins later this week. Leading the way in the […]
